description: This is a FastAPI route module that manages CRUD operations for 'tasks'. It includes endpoints for listing, creating, updating, toggling completion, and deleting tasks. The file uses SQLAlchemy ORM to interact with a database and defines the API schema for task-related operations.

methods.name: list_tasks(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves all tasks ordered by creation date and ID descending.

methods.name: create_task(payload: TaskCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new task with the provided title.

methods.name: update_task( payload: TaskUpdate, task_id: int = Path(..., description="Task ID."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Updates an existing task's title and/or completion status.

methods.name: toggle_task( task_id: int = Path(..., description="Task ID."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a task.

methods.name: delete_task( task_id: int = Path(..., description="Task ID."), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID.
